segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't help but worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink has no idea, her shoe is soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips on that wet floor, it could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting drenched too, what a mess that'll make.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the kids, the boy is up on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to grab cookies from the jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, reaching up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, not wanting the adult to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene screams potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
